column3: Cannot test this at the moment. I'm confused why `enable_shared=no` works in this case, tagged @fanquake as reviewer because of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19772#issuecomment-677962733 .

> Cannot test this at the moment. I'm confused why `enable_shared=no` works in this case

It controls who the libtool will be configured by the following `./configure` script.
